message.body: that's a lot of rain! not sad to be missing it...
i'm actually kinda glad you gave me that spending money b/c with the groceries i bought to stay with nar & em and the little bit of clothes shopping me did, i can use it. thanks for thinking ahead!
My pleasure! Thanks for getting good stuff!
and i really am liking the idea of you buying my s3 but i'd probably wait until august to so it, would that be okay?
What wait? The upgrade is available now i think.
i know, but i don't want to dip into my savings to do it if i don't have to.
We can figure something out when you get back. T9 is starting to drive of crazy!
hahahahahaha, perfect response. "t9 is starting to drive of crazy"
At one time i was a big fan until i made the connection between a bad attitude and when i was in one of his stories!
did you ever read one where an invisible dome is set over a town?
the pilot of the show we're watching ("under the dome") says it's based on a novel of his. you might like it.
not as of halfway through the pilot. but i checked, it was released in 2009.
I probably stopped reading his stuff before you were born so anything after that is new to me. What network is the show going to be on?
cbs. only two episodes so far, you should see if it's on hulu. if not, the pilot is on amazon prime, which i have (you could borrow my password)
Thanks. I will look into it in a while.
